org.ljtoolkit.data
Class PostEventMetadata

java.lang.Object
  org.ljtoolkit.data.PostEventMetadata

public class PostEventMetadata
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents metadata that may be used when posting a Live Journal event.

Author:
Troy Bourdon
